page.title: 03A LANGPORT GIRL'S DAY
page.content: I am a 10 year old girl. I live in Huish Episcopi with my parents and 2 sisters. I go to Huish Episcopi C.P.School.On the 10th June 1985 I got up at 7.30, I got dressed, went downstairs, had breakfast and brushed my hair. At 8 o'clock I put my packed lunch in my bag.I set off for school at 8.40.At school I hung up my bag and jacket then went into my classroom.At 9.10 everyone else came into the class.We did silent reading until 10.40 then we had play.After play we copied out spellings and finished some map work.At lunch break I played the recorder.For my lunch I had sandwiches,an apple and some sultanas(I am a vegetarian).After lunch we did some more map work and then some work on area.2.25 playtime.
